mapper.select: select lib_num libNum, lib_writer libWriter, lib_subject libSubject from library_1 order by lib_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into library_1(lib_num, lib_writer, lib_subject, lib_content, mem_id, ip_addr, lib_pw) values(seq_num1.nextval, #{libWriter}, #{libSubject}, #{libContent}, #{memId}, #{ipAddr}, #{libPw})
